detectors.description:
PiedPiperNetwork.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#79-84) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#81)
detectors.markdown:
[PiedPiperNetwork.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#L79-L84) can write the state variable array at will

detectors.description:
PiedPiperNetwork.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#86-92) can write the state variable array at will

	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#89)

detectors.description: Variable PiedPiperNetwork._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#44) is not in mixedCase

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#11)
	- PiedPiperNetwork.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#61-63)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#12)
	- PiedPiperNetwork.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#65-67)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- PiedPiperNetwork.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#69-71)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#13)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- PiedPiperNetwork.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#79-84)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#14)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- PiedPiperNetwork.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#73-77)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#15)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#31-32)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiedPiperNetwork.sol#33-35)
